name: RTL Biathlon 2009
overview: RTL Biathlon 2009, the newest part of RTL Sports' successful winter sports series, will let fans experience the enthusiasm of the most popular winter sport on the domestic screens. Among the playable athletes are many well-known German biathletes. Also Magdalena Neuner is again with the part. The sympathetic triple world champion will not only be integrated as a playable character, but will also act as a testimony of the advertising campaign around the upcoming winter sports spectacle. The exceptional sportswoman, who became world champion with 16 for the first time and won one title after the other, is equally popular among young and old alike and was voted "Sportswoman of the Year" in 2007. With the three different levels of difficulty, RTL Biathlon 2009 is not just for sports enthusiasts, but newcomers will soon be able to find the 15 original tracks. The thrilling atmosphere of the virtual competitions attracts professionals and beginners alike.
